data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hellas Verona's half?
In the minute 1, Free kick Juventus.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Juventus.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paulo Dybala for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 7, Hellas Verona are in shooting range from this free kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 10, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Hellas Verona.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Hellas Verona's Ebrima Colley is whistled for offside at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 18, Juventus's Aaron Ramsey has run offside.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Juventus's Federico Bernardeschi is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Paulo Dybala of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
In the minute 23, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
Hellas Verona's Nikola Kalinic misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 25, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Hellas Verona just outside Juventus's area.
Throw-in for Juventus at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus are pushing forward but Danilo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hellas Verona are coming forward and Alan Empereur gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 30, Juventus have a goal kick.
In Turin Hellas Verona's Nikola Kalinic is caught offside.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Hellas Verona.
In the minute 33, Paulo Dybala of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in high up the field for Juventus in Turin.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 36, In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Juventus a goal kick.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Juventus.
In the minute 39, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus.
At Allianz Stadium, Ronaldo Vieira has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
In the minute 41, Juventus apply pressure at Allianz Stadium and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Juan Cuadrado but the strike hits the bar!
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the away team a throw-in.
Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alvaro Morata for Juventus is whistled offside.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Fabrizio Pasqua will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
The first half has been concluded at Allianz Stadium.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hellas Veronaâ€™s Ebrima Colley is on his feet again at Allianz Stadium.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ebrima Colley for Hellas Verona who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Hellas Verona close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Hellas Verona.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Turin.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Juventus throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
In the minute 51, Ivan Ilic is replacing Adrien Tameze for the away team.
Hellas Verona are coming forward and Ebrima Colley gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Turin.
In the minute 54, Free kick Juventus.
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) is making a second substitution, with Giangiacomo Magnani replacing Federico Ceccherini.
Andrea Favilli is on a sub for Nikola Kalinic for Hellas Verona.
In the minute 56, Hellas Verona drives forward and Mattia Zaccagni gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hellas Verona have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 57, Darko Lazovic for Hellas Verona has been booked by Fabrizio Pasqua and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Hellas Verona in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 60, Goal! Hellas Verona have got their heads in front thanks to a Andrea Favilli strike.
Mattia Zaccagni instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 61, Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Federico Bernardeschi with Dejan Kulusevski.
The match at Allianz Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Andrea Favilli, who is down injured.
Ivan Juric (Hellas Verona) is making a fourth change, with Antonin Barak replacing the possibly injured Andrea Favilli.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Juventus in their own half.
Juventus's Paulo Dybala gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 64, Hellas Verona needs to be cautious. Juventus have an attacking throw-in.
Can Juventus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Juventus's Danilo breaks free at Allianz Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Allianz Stadium.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juventus drive upfield and Dejan Kulusevski gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hellas Verona defender.
In the minute 69, Free kick in a good position for Juventus!
Alan Empereur (Hellas Verona) has received a yellow card from Fabrizio Pasqua.
Paulo Dybala (Juventus) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Can Juventus capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hellas Verona's half?
In the minute 72, Hellas Verona will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juventus.
Alvaro Morata for Juventus drives towards goal at Allianz Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Juventus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Juventus have a dangerous throw-in.
Fabrizio Pasqua waits before resuming play because Leonardo Bonucci for Juventus is still down.
Juventus make their second substitution with Gianluca Frabotta replacing Leonardo Bonucci.
In the minute 76, Juventus drive forward but Paulo Dybala is judged offside.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Great shot from Juventus's Paulo Dybala but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 77, Dejan Kulusevski grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Allianz Stadium.
Alvaro Morata with an assist there.
Juventus's Adrien Rabiot gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Hellas Verona goal kick.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Allianz Stadium.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Juventus.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Hellas Verona in the half of Juventus.
Paulo Dybala of Juventus gets in a strike, but is off target.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Free kick Juventus.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the home team a throw-in.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 83, Hellas Verona have a goal kick.
Throw-in Hellas Verona.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona at Allianz Stadium.
In the minute 87, Paulo Dybala for Juventus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Hellas Verona at Allianz Stadium.
Ball safe as Juventus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 88, In Turin Hellas Verona attack through Darko Lazovic. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Juventus goal kick.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Juventus throw-in in Hellas Verona's half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the away team a throw-in.
Matteo Lovato for Hellas Verona is back on the field again.
Juventus pushes forward through Paulo Dybala, whose finish on goal is saved.
Alvaro Morata (Juventus) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
Juventus's Juan Cuadrado is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Hellas Verona a goal kick.
Throw-in for Hellas Verona in the half of Juventus.
In Turin a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Juventus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juventus push forward at Allianz Stadium and Juan Cuadrado gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hellas Verona defence.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Attention is being given to Hellas Veronaâ€™s Matteo Lovato and play has been suspended briefly.
Giacomo Vrioni is replacing Aaron Ramsey for the home team.
Hellas Verona's Davide Faraoni has been booked in Turin.
At Allianz Stadium, Dejan Kulusevski has been yellow-carded for the home team.
